article_title: $30K in damage done at Ralston playground
article_text:
A case of arson does $30,000 in damage at a Ralston school.

Witnesses said they watched a group of teens run from the Meadows Elementary School playground after they heard a blast Thursday.

Video: Fireworks blamed in playground fire

Authorities think fireworks were used, but the evidence was washed away as firefighters extinguished the burning rubber and plastic.

If you have any information, call the Arson Hotline at 402-444-3473.
